sect1.title: Revised chroot command
sect1.para: From now on when you exit the chroot environment and wish to re-enter it, you should run the following modified chroot command.

Additionally, now that all software has been installed there is no need to use anything from the /tools directory anymore, so it may be deleted. However, since the TCL, Expect, and DejaGNU packages only exist here, you may want to reinstall them after removing the /tools directory.
